body: Support 1 Million Campaign in Kenya: "...we are hoping that a simple declaration by 1 Million of Kenya's voters saying Kenya should stay in the ICC will convince parliament to stop their plans of withdrawing us from the court."
original_body: Support 1 Million Campaign in Kenya: "...we are hoping that a simple declaration by 1 Million of Kenya's voters saying Kenya should stay in the ICC will convince parliament to stop their plans of withdrawing us from the court."
title: Kenya: 1 Million Campaign
